body{font-family:Arial,sans-serif;margin:0}a{color:inherit;text-decoration:inherit}.header{display:flex;justify-content:center;height:33vh;padding-top:12%;width:100%;justify-self:center;background:linear-gradient(rgba(0,0,0,.5),rgba(0,0,0,.5)),url(/3a0f71636aba0abfca518aa045fe069c.jpg);background-position:50%;background-size:cover;color:#fff;font-size:xx-large;letter-spacing:.03rem}.main-options-container{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around;padding-top:3%}.header-info{display:flex;flex-direction:row;position:absolute;top:0;right:0;padding:.2em}.header-info rgba(0,0,0,.2);width:30%;height:50vh;transition:all .2s ease-in-out;overflow-y:auto}.option-box-main{height:35vh}.option-box h2{font-weight:300;font-size:large;margin:.2rem}.option-box p{margin:.2rem;font-weight:100;opacity:.75}.option-box 20%;height:75vh;overflow-y:auto;padding:1rem;border-radius:2rem;z-index:3;width:60%}.modal-link{color:grey}.modal-link:hover{cursor:pointer}.modal-img{border-top-left-radius:2rem;border-top-right-radius:2rem;width:100%;height:70%;max-height:400px;object-fit:cover}.close-modal{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;cursor:default;z-index:2}.info-tag{padding:.2em;background:#9fa8a3;display:flex;width:fit-content;margin-left:auto;margin-top:.1em;border-radius:.2em}.star-img,.star-img-user{height:20px;width:auto}.star-img-user{opacity:.4}.star-img-user:hover,.star-img-user:hover+.star-img-user,.star-img-user:hover+.star-img-user+.star-img-user,.star-img-user:hover+.star-img-user+.star-img-user+.star-img-user,.star-img-user:hover+.star-img-user+.star-img-user+.star-img-user+.star-img-user{opacity:1;cursor:pointer}.rating-container{display:flex;flex-direction:row;padding-top:1em;padding-bottom:1em}.comment{background:#9fa8a3}.comment,.new-comment{padding:.5em;margin:.2em}.new-comment{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.new-comment
